name: TATUM GAMES | HEROES VS VILLAINS (Canceled)
blurb: Heroes Vs Villains (HV) is an AMAZINGLY EPIC superhero themed, collectible card game (CCG) initially aimed for the Android platform!

rewards.reward: <<SPEEDSTER>> You have our sincere thanks for helping us make this project happen! You will get free, lifetime updates of both the Kickstarter and all details concerning Heroes Vs Villains before and after it launches. You also will receive a special code with instructions on how to collect one STARTER DECK PACT worth $10!

<<GADGETEER>> You will get free, lifetime updates of both the Kickstarter and all details concerning Heroes Vs Villains before and after it launches. You also will receive a special code with instructions on how to collect one STARTER DECK PACT worth $10 and one STARTER RUNE PACT worth $10!!

<<ACROBAT>> You will get free, lifetime updates of both the Kickstarter and all details concerning Heroes Vs Villains before and after it launches. You will receive a special code with instructions on how to collect one RARE DECK PACT worth $20 and one RARE RUNE PACT worth $20!

<<PARAGON>> You get everything from the ACROBAT! You will also receive an exclusive LEGENDARY REWARD that will include the leader of the Legion of Guardians, Protector! Protector is a LEGENDARY REWARD, and will not be offered at any time in the game. You will be the sole owner(s) of this very powerful Guardian!!

<<ENERGIZER>> You get everything from GADGETEER and ACROBAT! You will also receive an exclusive LEGENDARY REWARD that will include the \u201cevil version\u201d of Protector! Evil Protector is a LEGENDARY REWARD, and will not be offered at any time in the game. You will be the sole owner(s) of this very powerful Guardian!! Note: Evil Protector is not more powerful than normal Protector, but the two look starkly different.

<< ARMORED HERO>> You get everything from GADGETEER! You will also receive a digital book with concept arts, sketches, finished pieces and photos of development. This package will also include several digital high res wallpapers. And you will receive a special code with instructions on how to collect one LEGENDARY DECK PACT worth $30 and one LEGENDARY RUNE PACT worth $30!

<<HEALER>> You get everything from ACROBAT (x2)! You will also receive a digital book with concept arts, sketches, finished pieces and photos of development. This package will also include several digital high res wallpapers. And you will receive a special code with instructions on how to collect one LEGENDARY DECK PACT worth $30 and one LEGENDARY RUNE PACT worth $30. Your name will also be included into our game credits with special thanks!

<<TIME MANIPULATOR>> You get everything from ACROBAT (x2)! You also get access to the Beta version of Heroes Vs Villains before the game is released! You will be one of the first to experience Heroes Vs Villains, playing up against other Backers and the Developers!! This package will also include a special code with instructions on how to collect two LEGENDARY DECK PACTS worth $60 and two LEGENDARY RUNE PACTS worth $60 for both the Beta and final released version of the game. Your name will also be included into our game credits with special thanks!

<<GUARDIAN>> You get everything from ARMORED HERO (x3)! You also get access to the Beta version of Heroes Vs Villains before the game is released! You get to also craft and mastermind your own superhero! We will grant you exclusive permission into our online developer portal to work with our Creative Team Department (CTD), Artists and Developers to create a Guardian to be implemented into the Heroes Vs Villains game! Best part is that we will work with your schedule and you won\u2019t even have to leave your home, everything can happen remotely!! Last but not least, you will be granted a developers credit and your name will be included into our game credits with special thanks!

<<ANTI-HERO>> You get everything from ARMORED HERO (x3) and GUARDIAN! You get to also craft and mastermind your own supervillain! What\u2019s a superhero without a formidable supervillain, right!? Supervillains serve as the bosses in Heroes Vs Villains. Unlike normal villains, supervillains require teams of players to collaborate and strategize to defeat them! We will grant you exclusive permission into our online developer portal to work with our Creative Team Department (CTD), Artists and Developers to create a supervillain to be implemented into the Heroes Vs Villains game! Best part is that we will work with your schedule and you won\u2019t even have to leave your home, everything can happen remotely!! Last but not least, you will be granted a developers credit and your name will be included into our game credits with special thanks!
